name: LD47: Ship Loopscape
description:
Platformer game with single screen room. With each successfull passage the room will be modified to increase difficulty. Controlls can change with each level.

Escape breaking ship damaged with randomly appearing field with inverted gravity.

Controll:

Keys: A and D or arrow keys for movement, Spacebar for jumping when possible

Notes:
Platformer movement
Changing movement rules
Inverted gravitation
Iterative mechanics introduction
Estimated play time 1-3 minutes
